intro: Psychotria estrellana, commonly known as the Estrellana Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant native to the cloud forests of Central America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white or pale green flowers. It typically grows in shaded, moist environments and is often found in the understory of tropical forests. Psychotria estrellana is also noted for its potential medicinal properties, though further research is needed to confirm its uses.
